entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 1:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 17.7 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
